entry.title: In Exchange For Your Heart
entry.summary:
Author: ellehir

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 292,935Chapters: 50/50Kudos: 1,074

Summary: Dark!fic AU*Now with beautiful art by LightsAtTintagel!*The Kingdom of Avalon has fallen. Arthur finds himself the reluctant keeper of the fallen enemy prince.Destiny had somehow made a mistake.***"You don't have to, you know," Arthur said. "Not all the time.""What?" came Merlin's clipped response from the corner after a moment.Arthur turned around to face his captive. "Be this," he gestured at Merlin broadly. "Be defiant, brave...stoic...all the time. It's painful to watch."Merlin did not answer. Arthur sighed."Just...just...when that door closes, when we reach the end of the day. Just allow yourself to relax for just a while." Arthur tried on a small smile, holding his palms up in a gesture of surrender. "I promise I won't tell anybody."

entry.title: Bringer of Light, Darkness, Magic, and All Things Inbetween
entry.summary:
Author: witerwallyanerd

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,530Chapters: 9/16Kudos: 28

Summary: My first fic guys! Say hello to god Merlin, sad Merlin, hurt Arthur, and really confused everyone else!-witerwallyanerdMerlin had been living a lie since he knew what one was. Ealdor lied in the border of Cenred’s kingdom and Camelot, and was much more tolerant of magic than Camelot was.Even so, you could only show so much ability before people got suspicious.So in Ealdor, it had always been playing down his abilities. He never imagined he was going to be hiding them completely. Merlin lived by Gaius’ rules, most of the time. Half the time. Whenever they didn’t get in his way, if he was being honest.However, recently, his magic had been itchy, for lack of better words. He felt it under his skin, in his veins, his hair. Heard it in every breath he breathed, every word that came from his mouth.

entry.title: So A Warlock and A Con Man walk into a Grocery Store...
entry.summary:
Author: TheFallenAngel2008

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,273Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 4

Summary: So Merlin was in Vegas. Las Vegas. No real reason. Was it vacation? For him, yes. For others? Well, he worked at a grocery store for no real reason other than because he could. So no. But oh well.One night he sees a strange man in a red jacket trying to get away with stolen food. And, well, who was Merlin to rat him out? And so, it turns out, that sometimes when you do a good thing, good things happen to you as well. Kind of.

entry.title: Didn't know I could hurt like this
entry.summary:
Author: jungvaa

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,651Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 41

Summary: Everything in their life was so much better.Camelot was safe, magic wasn’t banned anymore. The happiest people from this repeal of the ban were Morgana and Merlin, they didn’t have to hide themselves anymore. With Uther’s death, Arthur had decided to repeal the ban and since then they were trying to make Camelot better together. Merlin was court sorcerer now; he wasn’t a servant anymore. He loved being more important in the castle, but also, he missed seeing Arthur every minute. Because he was busier, they weren’t spending much time together anymore. It wasn’t doing any good to Merlin’s heart, but at least they were all safe. He didn’t have to try to save Arthur’s life all the time, his king was safe from all the evil beings now. But, why was he feeling like something was wrong, then? In other words, Arthur is hurting and Merlin doesn't know what to do.

entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,131,648Chapters: 73/?Kudos: 1,144

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

entry.title: Music is like Magic
entry.summary:
Author: Oakfiddle

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,597Chapters: 1/5Kudos: 18

Summary: "Classical musicians thinks they're royalty.", Merlin muttered to himself. “Why don’t you play drones? Or is that too difficult for you, My Lord?”Arthur stood up. The anger made his entire body shake. He wasn't going to stay here and be spoken to in this insulting way!-----Arthur plays the violin. Merlin plays the fiddle. Same instrument, but completely different techniques. How will they be able to get along?AU everyone's a musician.

entry.title: King & Court
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,250Chapters: 20/?Kudos: 916

Summary: Loneliness is an insidious thing. When Merlin looks at Arthur, he sees not just a prince waiting for his time to rule, but a young man struggling to find his place in the world, with little help from anyone else.The truth is, Arthur needs more than the friendship Merlin can offer. He needs people he can trust: men and women who will become his court and his confidants, and if he is going to survive to take the throne and lead Camelot into its golden age, he needs them sooner rather than later.Finding loopholes in Uther’s laws is no easy feat. Court life is a dangerous game, but it’s one Merlin has every intention of winning so that Arthur can have knights of his choosing by his side.And then there is the matter of his magic…

entry.title: Forever Is My Tomorrow
entry.summary:
Author: Mahogany_Rust

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 325,361Chapters: 35/80Kudos: 906

Summary: It had actually been a long time since Hiccup had thought about how he would die.When he was young, every sunrise was another gamble to see if he would get himself eaten by a dragon or somehow manage to fall off one of Berk’s many cliffs.Perhaps Winter would finally choose to break his wiry body with illness or he would catch an unfortunate stray battle axe.Yet here he was, 21, about to die in the wrong place (not a bad age to reach in the Archipelago when you’re Hiccup Haddock, let's be honest).But that was the thing wasn’t it? Hiccup made plenty of marks all in the wrong places.What if one of those marks was in the future? On one unsuspecting spirit’s affections?---- FIMT CINEMATIC TRAILER

entry.title: Address Your Letters to Me
entry.summary:
Author: livinginthetheater

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,437Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 65

Summary: Merlin is sent alone, without Arthur on a mission to Northumbria to lift a curse that is killing its people. While he's gone, Merlin and Arthur exchange letters that become increasingly revealing. Missing one other seems to be the push they need to cross that line between being friends to something more.But the situation in Northumbria soon becomes more dangerous and Merlin's life is put in danger. Arthur learns the hard way just how much he needs Merlin by his side.

entry.summary:
Author: Joo_Jules

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,268Chapters: 5/11Kudos: 19

Summary: Camelot is put in danger once again when Merlin is kidnapped and used as bait by the enemy to capture Arthur. However, Merlin manages to make it back to Camelot. Now it's his turn to rescue Arthur, and potentially the kingdom.After all, it's part of his destiny.
